Break TAI patterns using gaTAI

Source: vignettes/tai-breaker.Rmd
tai-breaker.Rmd

Motivation for breaking the hourglass

Inspired by the ‘ontogeny-phylogeny’ correlations and the hourglass model of evolutionary development, we recently asked whether we could break the hourglass or any TAI profile by extracting a stable set of genes, and gain information about the role these extracted genes have in the development of the organism.

Further motivation is in this thesis.

Break the hourglass using gaTAI 

library(myTAI)
data("example_phyex_set")
myTAI::destroy_pattern(example_phyex_set)

…

This is a teaser.

The myTAI::destroy_pattern() requires the package gataiR which is still under development.
